data.title: Fortinet and IBM Security
data.meta_description: Transform your security with enterprise security solutions from Fortinet and IBM Security. This alliance between industry leaders Fortinet and IBM Security provides enterprises with real-time proactive protection and better remediation with cost-efficient operations.
data.text:
Fortinet Named a Challenger in the 2024 GartnerÂ® Magic Quadrant for Security Information and Event Management (SIEM)

FortiSIEM supports the advanced IT/OT security analytics, AI-driven capabilities, and solution scalability required by both the modern enterprise and managed security services providers.
